snippet: Dana Beal, 65, a longtime medical-marijuana advocate, is in a Nebraska jail awaiting trial after he was caught with what the police said was 180 pounds of marijuana. He sent a letter to a judge complaining about his treatment.
abstract: Dana Beal, 65, a longtime medical-marijuana advocate, is in a Nebraska jail awaiting trial after he was caught with what the police said was 180 pounds of marijuana. He sent a letter to a judge complaining about his treatment.

headline.main: Jailhouse Letter: Dear Judge, 'The Staff Actually Discontinued My Fish Oil'
